name: Cat Castle
description:
The project is meant to only build the world and environment of the game, it pays no attention about the overall mechanics or the playability of the game. 

It showcases my concept design and modelling abilities at the current stage. The image below is my initial design concept for this Island.

This was some of the early iterations and concept of the game, I initially wanted to contain Sci-fi elements but it was clashing and too contrasting with the cat concept. And I don't think I would be able to make these two work in harmony.

Some of the early concept work that I have done for my town villagers (although they didn't make it into the final scene)

some thumbnails and sketches that I have done while planning the scenery. 

This is a idealised concept of what the inside of the castle would look like when inhabited by their rightful residents.

Hope you can enjoy the walk through of this mini-project.
